mapper.insert: INSERT INTO etop_service ( service_id,service_no,club_id,service_type, service_status,company_id,company_name, apply_time,applicant,applicant_phone, applicant_department,applicant_position, description,building_no,zone_no,storey,room_no,isfree,changes,room_id) VALUES( #{service_id},#{service_no}, #{club_id},#{service_type}, #{service_status},#{company_id},#{company_name}, #{apply_time}, #{applicant},#{applicant_phone}, #{applicant_department}, #{applicant_position}, #{description},#{building_no},#{zone_no},#{storey},#{room_no},#{isfree},#{changes},#{room_id} )

INSERT INTO etop_service ( service_id,service_no,club_id,service_type, service_status,company_id,company_name, apply_time,applicant,applicant_phone, applicant_department,applicant_position, description,building_no,zone_no,storey,room_no,isfree,changes,room_id) VALUES( #{serviceId},#{serviceNo}, #{clubId},#{serviceType}, #{serviceStatus},#{companyId},#{companyName}, #{applyTime}, #{applicant},#{applicantPhone}, #{applicantDepartment}, #{applicantPosition}, #{description},#{buildingNo},#{zoneNo},#{storey},#{roomNo},#{isfree},#{changes},#{roomId} )
mapper.select: SELECT company_name FROM etop_company WHERE company_id=#{company_id}
